This interactive mind map presents a structured overview of methods for **treatment effect estimation** in causal inference grouped by its **core identification strategy**.  

Hover over each node to learn more about the method. Use it as a **learning aid**, a **reference guide**, or simply a way to explore the landscape of modern causal inference from a statistical viewpoint.
